features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Improving education with AI
features.description: Wonk revolutionizes the educational experience for both students and teachers. By leveraging artificial intelligence, Wonk provides personalized assistance and a seamless platform for communication, learning, and growth.

sections.title: Main Features
sections.ai_chat_description: Personalized Support: Students can ask questions in chat, and our AI, trained on educational content, provides personalized answers in English, Russian, and Kazakh.
sections.instant_help_description: Receive immediate academic support tailored to each student's needs, enhancing learning outside the classroom.
sections.organization_description: Students can save helpful chatbot answers, creating their own study resources for effective review.
sections.submission_description: Students submit assignments through the app and easily check their grades.
sections.feedback_description: Teachers upload assignments and provide feedback, keeping students informed of their academic progress.
sections.streamlined_process_description: Simplifies the submission and grading process, helping students stay on top of their performance.
sections.personal_schedule_description: Access to a personalized class schedule and relevant study materials.
sections.timely_updates_description: Teachers update schedules and upload materials for upcoming classes, ensuring students have the necessary resources.
sections.preparedness_description: Helps students prepare for classes by providing the right materials and information on time.
